p: To express the KS domain in A. thaliana, two different constructs with different selection and screening marker genes were built. The plastidial overexpression construct contains a KS domain from PUFA synthase (accession no. PRJNA368972) fused with a functional chloroplasts transit peptide (CTP) at the N-terminus [ 37] and a DsRed2 from Discosoma sp. encoding a red fluorescent protein, each under the control of a seed-specific napin promoter [ 38], as well as an antibiotic kanamycin-resistance gene under the control of a constitutive nos promoter.
